with t_result as( select a.store_id, b.store_name, sum(round(nvl(a.begin_money, 0), c.para_value)) as begin_money, sum(round(nvl(a.in_money, 0), c.para_value)) as in_money, sum(round(nvl(a.out_money, 0), c.para_value)) as out_money, sum(round(nvl(a.begin_money, 0), c.para_value)) + sum(round(nvl(a.in_money, 0), c.para_value)) - sum(round(nvl(a.out_money, 0), c.para_value)) as end_money from mat_inv_balance a left join hos_store_dict b on a.group_id = b.group_id and a.hos_id = b.hos_id and a.store_id = b.store_id and b.is_stop = 0 left join acc_para c on a.group_id = c.group_id and a.hos_id = c.hos_id and a.copy_code = c.copy_code and c.mod_code = '04' and c.para_code = '04005' where a.group_id = #{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and a.hos_id = #{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and a.copy_code = #{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.year = #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.month = #{month,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and a.store_id in ( select perm_code from v_user_data_perm where group_id = #{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and hos_id = #{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and table_code = 'HOS_STORE_DICT' and user_id = #{user_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and is_read = 1 and is_write = 1 ) GROUP BY a.store_id, b.store_name order by a.store_id ) select a.store_id, b.store_name, begin_money, in_money, out_money, end_money from t_result union all select null, cast('合计' as varchar2(20)), sum(begin_money), sum(in_money), sum(out_money), sum(end_money) from t_result
